mapper.sql: division_sn_code, change_code, bid_result_code, change_type, eng_num_old, eng_num_change, eng_num_new, unit_price_old, unit_price_change, unit_price_new, change_supplier
mapper.select:
select
, b.* from sub_div_work_tender_result_change_bill a left join tenant_${parentTenantAccount}.supplier b on a.change_supplier = b.supplier_credit_code where a.change_code = #{changeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
